concept.title: Metric Alerts
concept.shortdesc: Metric alerts are alerts based on pipeline and stage statistics, such as a high rate of bad records or a batch of records taking too long to process.

conbody.p: You can configure metric alerts based on the metric type, the metric, an element associated with the metric, and a condition.
Metric alerts display in the window in Monitoring mode. You can also configure a metric alert to send email to all email addresses associated with the pipeline.
You can configure metric alerts when you configure the pipeline or after you start the pipeline. The metric alert takes effect after you enable the alert.
